Common.FloorPlans.Common.ImageCaption: LYONS 106_ LYONS PARK_ COVENTRY - SITE PLAN

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
Lyons Park is located on the western outskirts of Coventry, within easy reach of the A45 trunk road linking Coventry and Birmingham. The M42, M6 and M1 motorways place 89% of England and Wales within a four-hour HGV drivetime, while the M69, M40 and M5 provide wider UK connectivity. The established park is home to Amazon, Jaguar Land Rover and several local manufacturing, distribution and technology businesses, including The Expert Group, Impression Technologies, Polymer Logistics and Christie Lites UK, making this a valuable employment site for the region.

Available from January 2022, Lyons 106 will provide 105,699 sq ft of high quality industrial / warehouse space delivered to a market-leading specification. Designed to offer customers flexibility and maximise operational efficiency, including high quality office space that can be configured to meet a company’s bespoke requirements. The property will include the above key features as well as the points listed below:
•	10 docks (8 standard and 2 multi dock doors)
•	‘Chill store’ ready building with Chronus cladding, suitable for both chilled and ambient storage
•	30 cycle spaces
•	Extensive number of sustainability features to improve energy efficiently and reduce carbon emissions

Common.Photos.Common.ImageCaption: LYONS 106_ LYONS PARK_ COVENTRY - MAIN
LYONS 106_ LYONS PARK_ COVENTRY - YARD
LYONS 106_ LYONS PARK_ COVENTRY - CAR PARK

Common.FloorPlans.Common.ImageCaption: LANDOR STREET UNIT 1_ BIRMINGHAM_ B8 1AH FLOORPLAN

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
The Unit is situated in a prominent position on the corner of Landor Street and Lawley Middleway (A4540), approximately 1.5 miles to the East of Birmingham City Centre. There is excellent road access to the A47 (Heartlands Spine Road) and A45 (Coventry Road).

The A4540 (Middle Ring Road) gives direct access to the Aston Expressway (A38) and junction 6 of the M6 approximately 3 miles north of the property. 

Unit 1 offers 63,325 sq ft and is fully fitted with sodium spot lighting with 10% translucent roof panels.

Common.Photos.Common.ImageCaption: LANDOR STREET UNIT 1_ BIRMINGHAM_ B8 1AH
LANDOR STREET UNIT 1_ BIRMINGHAM_ B8 1AH AERIAL

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
Situated close to the Pensnett Trading Estate and the long-established clay manufacturer Hinton Perry & Davenhill Ltd. The proposed speculative development is in the heart of the Black County benefiting from a skilled local workforce and will provide essential manufacturing and distribution accommodation in this location.

The site comprises a self-contained, secure development plot of 2.4 acres. Phase One comprises two units of 7,500 sq ft and 10,000 sq ft units which can be combined to provide one unit if required. Further Build to Suit options up to 21,750 sq ft are also available to suit specific occupiers’ requirements. The site is part of Dudley Business and Innovation Enterprise Zone benefiting from reduced business rates and is suitable for light industrial, storage and distribution.

Common.Photos.Common.ImageCaption: DREADNOUGHT BUSINESS PARK - MAIN

Common.FloorPlans.Common.ImageCaption: VAUGHAN PARK UNIT 5_ TIPTON ROAD_ TIPTON - FLOORPLAN

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
Location

Unit 5 is located within Phase 1 of Vaughan Park, a 28-acre industrial estate fronting the A457 Tipton Road. Excellent access to the national motorway network is provided at Junctions 1 & 2 of the M5 motorway which are within 3 miles and 4.5 miles respectively.

Description

Unit 5 is a 24,332 sq ft (2,260.5 sq m) new industrial/warehouse unit of steel portal frame construction.

Common.FloorPlans.Common.ImageCaption: VAUGHAN PARK PHASE 3_ TIPTON ROAD_ TIPTON - SITEPLAN

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
Vaughan Park is a 28 acre estate situated on the A457 Tipton Road within an established industrial location and benefiting from a skilled local workforce. Junctions 1 and 2 of the M5 motorway are within 3 miles and 4.5 miles respectively, providing excellent access to the national motorway network. 

Phase 3 offers exciting, high quality industrial/ warehouse accommodation from 11,000 to 20,500 sq ft with combined units up to 52,000 sq ft.

Units 6-8 and 9-10 can be combined into 2 larger units of 52,000 sq ft and 27,000 sq ft respectively.

Common.FloorPlans.Common.ImageCaption: FARADAY POINT_ HAMS HALL_ COLESHILL - FLOOR PLAN

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
The property is prominently located at the entrance of the established Hams Hall Distribution Park, a premier Industrial and Distribution location in the Midlands. Access to Junction 9 of the M42 Motorway and junction T1 of the M6 Toll is within 1 mile and junction 4 of the M6 only 4 miles away. Local occupiers include DHL, JLR, BMW, Sainsbury’s, Kuehne & Nagel and ABB. Hams Hall also provides an on-site Intermodal Rail Freight Terminal.

The property comprises a modern and secure, self-contained industrial warehouse with loading yard, separate car park and offices.

Available Q4 2021.

Common.Photos.Common.ImageCaption: FARADAY POINT_ HAMS HALL_ COLESHILL - MAIN

Dynamic.PrimaryImage.Common.ImageCaption: FARADAY POINT_ HAMS HALL_ COLESHILL - MAIN

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
A new logistics and manufacturing development with opportunities available from 70,000 - 600,000 sq ft.  In partnership with Birmingham City Council, IM Properties is development an exemplar new development, built to the highest standards of sustainability in an environment where businesses can thrive.  

IM Properties is developing Zone A totalling 1.38m sq ft, with a new strategic gateway on the A38 and sitewide infrastructure.  The unrivalled location provides many advantages including local and regional connectivity, availability of skilled labour and extensive local catchment.

Common.Photos.Common.ImageCaption: PEDDIMORE BIRMINGHAM BROCHURE
